name: Blonde vs Brunette RPS
description:
Blonde vs Brunette - the battle of all time! Who will win? Play BvB with a friend to find out!
✰ Pick your side.
✰ Select your move - Rock, Paper or Scissors.  
✰ Complete 5 missions to hone your skills and become RPS Sensei.
✰ Play solo or with a friend - make decisions and solve disputes with style!

FIVE ★ REVIEWS - THANK YOU!

★★★★★ The constant war! - Excellent game series! -- Frank the swordsman, Canada

★★★★★ I love this game! -- Carol Ann Coffman, USA

★★★★★ Great for settling disputes geek-style. -- LazyGirl :D, USA

★★★★★ A simple and interesting game. Recommended! -- かすみちゃんハァハァ, Japan

★★★★★ How lovely game. -- edw12345678, China
